name: Twitter is My Bat-Signal badge
description:
Have a question but no answer? Can't remember the name of that guy in that thing? Looking for help on a super-cool, new project?

Fear not, Twitter is here. Cast your Tweet into the net like a shining light in Gotham's night sky and wait for the WWW to come to your aid.

Â£1.50 gets you one of these badges so you can show your respect for the life-line that is Twitter.
